page.title: 17BUSINESS IN EARLS COLNE
page.content: My mum and dad's business is called{ {Colne Heating}.They stock a range of about 60 different stoves and cookers. The stoves and cookers come from all over{England}and they also import cookers from{Italy}.They have 2 plumbers and a lady comes in several days of the week.My dad has been selling stoves for the last 4 years and before that he used to sell 1 kind of stove which he made.Lots of people are buying stoves now because they are finding it a lot cheaper than other sources of heat.Stoves are approximately 75cm wide,stoves normally has 2 doors at the front and you can either have a chimney coming out the back of the stove and up or you can have the chimney going straight up.
